html-spa.body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en-US">

<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8" />
	<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
	<title>${1:Single Page App}</title>

</head>

<body>

	<spa-component src="${2:rootComponentName}"></spa-component>
$0
	<script src="${3://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@latest/dist/jquery.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${4://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/handlebars@latest/dist/handlebars.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${5://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/sucom/SPA.js/dist/spa-bundle.min.js}"></script>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>

<head>

</head>

$0

html-spa-bs.body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en-US">

<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8" />
	<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
	<title>${1:Single Page App}</title>

	<link rel="stylesheet" href="${8://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@4.3.1/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css}" />

</head>

<body>

	<spa-component src="${2:rootComponentName}"></spa-component>
$0
	<script src="${3://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@latest/dist/jquery.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${4://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/popper.js@latest/dist/umd/popper.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${5://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@4.3.1/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${6://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/handlebars@latest/dist/handlebars.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${7://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/sucom/SPA.js/dist/spa-bundle.min.js}"></script>

</body>

</html>

html-xsr-bs.body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en-US">

<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8" />
	<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
	<title>${1:Single Page App}</title>

	<link rel="stylesheet" href="${8://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@4.3.1/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css}" />

</head>

<body>

	<x-component src="${2:rootComponentName}"></x-component>
$0
	<script src="${3://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@latest/dist/jquery.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${4://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/popper.js@latest/dist/umd/popper.min.js}"></script>
	<script src="${5://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@4.3.1/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js}"></script>

</body>

</html>

meta-seo.body:
<meta name="robots" content="index,follow" />
<meta name="keywords" content="${1}" />
<meta name="description" content="${2}" />$0

meta-no-cache.body:
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate" />
<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache" />
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0" />$0

tag-spa-component.description: SPA - Render Component here using tag

tag-x-component.description: XSR - Render Component here using tag

attr-data-spa-component.description: XSR/SPA - Render Component here using attribute

i18n-lang.description: SPA - i18n default language in <body> tag

spa-nav-show.description: SPA - Navigation control using body class to show url routes.

spa-nav-hide.description: SPA - Navigation control using body class to hide url routes.

spa-nav-block.description: SPA - Navigation control using body class to block browser's back/forward navigation.

spa-defaults-components.description: SPA - component's default attributes in body tag

xsr-defaults-components.description: XSR - component's default attributes in body tag

hb-replaceStringOnRegEx.description: SPA - HB-helper replace string. Search by RegEx Pattern.

hb-dateNowMs.description: XSR/SPA - HB-helper current time in milliseconds.

hb-dateNowFormat.description: XSR/SPA - HB-helper current date time in given format.

hb-dateNowFormatHelp.body:
<!-- :dateNow FormatString Help
*   'YY'   : Full Year (4 digits)
*   'YYYY' : Full Year (4 digits)
*   'Y'    : Full Year (4 digits)
*
*   'Mmmm' : January
*   'MMMM' : JANUARY
*   'Mmm'  : Jan
*   'MMM'  : JAN
*   '0M'   : 01 (01-12 month in 2 digits)
*   'MM'   : 1  ( 1-12 month in 1 digit till 9)
*
*   'Dddd' : Sunday
*   'DDDD' : SUNDAY
*   'Ddd'  : Sun
*   'DDD'  : SUN
*   'Dd'   : Su
*   'DD'   : SU
*   '0d'   : 06 (01-31 date in 2 digits)
*   'dd'   : 6  ( 1-31 date in 1 digit till 9)
*
*
*   '0h'   : 09 (00-23 hour in 2 digits)
*   'hh'   : 9  ( 0-23 hour in 1 digit till 9)
*   '0m'   : 05 (00-59 minute in 2 digits)
*   'mm'   : 5  ( 0-59 minute in 1 digit till 9)
*   '0s'   : 01 (00-59 seconds in 2 digits)
*   'ss'   : 1  ( 0-59 seconds in 1 digit till 9)
*
*   'ms'   : 456 (milliseconds 0 - 999)
-->

hb-moment.description:
XSR/SPA - HB-helper date-time format using moment.js
** Requires moment.js **

hb-rand.description: XSR/SPA - HB-helper random number between min and max.

hb-randPwd.description: XSR/SPA - HB-helper random number between min and max.
